title: Research Audience Interests
description: A media planner needs to identify key interests for a target audience to use for ad targeting on social media.

tasks.description: Define the core target audience based on demographics (e.g., women aged 25-34 in the US).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear definition of the target persona.

tasks.description: Use a tool like Facebook Audience Insights or a third-party analytics tool to find the top interests, hobbies, and followed pages for this demographic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of relevant interests (e.g., 'yoga', 'healthy eating', 'skincare').

tasks.description: Group the interests into logical themes to be used for creating different ad sets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates 3-5 distinct interest-based audience themes.
